title: High-End Oceanside Seclusion by the Prestigious Aman Hotel Brand
description: Leave civilisation behind and escape to the sparkling southeastern shores of Vietnam’s Vinh Hy Bay - just two hours south of Nha Trang and only 70 minutes from the airport. Exuding absolute luxury in every way, the five-star Amanoi Resort - a high-end property by the prestigious Aman group - sits on its own private beach, framed by the vibrant mountains of Núi Chúa National Park. Enjoy a five or seven-escape with daily breakfast, daily set-menu lunches, a decadent Vietnamese dinner for two, welcome cocktails on arrival, private return airport transfers and more.
offer_address: Vĩnh Hy, Ninh Hải District, Ninh Thuan Province, Vietnam
